topics.body: So I just had a weird thought. What do you think an alien's sense of aesthetics would be like, particularly in terms of physical attraction? Like would would a turian find sexy? Or what if there's an alien species that gets horny based off the size of it's partners eyes or it's horns or it's glorble-pouch or something.

rereading some of the past homestuck pages.

it seems trolls are attracted to a dominative figure.

the more badass, bloodthirsty, ass kicking a troll is, the more likely another one is gonna fall in love with him/her.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545b19336368723870e20100#post_545b19336368723870e20100
There's some background dialogue where a few alien species are talking about how they think asari are attractive. A Turian mentions that they look "just like turians" and if I remember correctly he says it's because of the ridges on their heads. 

Although I feel like this was written before the ever designed a female Turian since their head and facial features are much more subdued than male ones. Unless... That particular Turian was swinging for the other team...
